verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Ye shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%>: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H6918>holy<s%>.
¶ Ye shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
¶ <S%H6437>Turn<s%> ye not unto <S%H457>idols<s%>, nor <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
¶ And if ye <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will<s%>.

It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> ye <S%H2077>offer<s%> it, and on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>: and if ought <S%H3498>remain<s%> until the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And if it be <S%H398>eaten<s%> at <S%H398>all<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, it is <S%H6292>abominable<s%>; it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%>.

Therefore every one that <S%H398>eateth<s%> it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, because he hath <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the hallowed <S%H6944>thing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

¶ And when ye <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%>, thou shalt not wholly <S%H3615>reap<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H5953>glean<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> every <S%H6528>grape<s%> of thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>; thou shalt <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H1616>stranger<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
¶ Ye shall not <S%H1589>steal<s%>, neither deal <S%H3584>falsely<s%>, neither <S%H8266>lie<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H5997>another<s%>.
¶ And ye shall not <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt not <S%H6231>defraud<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, neither <S%H1497>rob<s%> him: the <S%H6468>wages<s%> of him that is <S%H7916>hired<s%> shall not <S%H3885>abide<s%> with thee all night until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt not <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf<s%>, nor <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%>, but shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, nor <S%H1921>honour<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1419>mighty<s%>: but in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shalt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt not <S%H3212>go<s%> up and down as a <S%H7400>talebearer<s%> among thy <S%H5971>people<s%>: neither shalt thou <S%H5975>stand<s%> against the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt not <S%H8130>hate<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>: thou shalt in any <S%H3198>wise<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>, and not <S%H5375>suffer<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> upon him.

¶ Thou shalt not <S%H5358>avenge<s%>, nor bear any <S%H5201>grudge<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, but thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> as <S%H3644>thyself<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>. Thou shalt not let thy <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H7250>gender<s%> with a diverse <S%H3610>kind<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%> with mingled <S%H3610>seed<s%>: neither shall a <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H3610>mingled<s%> of linen and <S%H8162>woollen<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> upon thee.

¶ And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H2233%H7902>carnally<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that is a <S%H8198>bondmaid<s%>, <S%H2778>betrothed<s%> to an <S%H376>husband<s%>, and not at <S%H6299>all<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%>, nor <S%H2668>freedom<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> her; she shall be <S%H1244>scourged<s%>; they shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>, because she was not <S%H2666>free<s%>.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, even a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he hath <S%H2398>done<s%>: and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he hath <S%H2398>done<s%> shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

¶ And when ye shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%>, and shall have <S%H5193>planted<s%> all manner of <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, then ye shall <S%H6188>count<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof as <S%H6188%H6190>uncircumcised<s%>: <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> shall it be as <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> unto you: it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%> of.
But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H1974>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> withal.

And in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it may <S%H3254>yield<s%> unto you the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
¶ Ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> any thing with the <S%H1818>blood<s%>: neither shall ye use <S%H5172>enchantment<s%>, nor observe <S%H6049>times<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H5362>round<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H2206>beard<s%>.

Ye shall not <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3793>any<s%> <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead<s%>, nor <S%H5414>print<s%> any <S%H7085>marks<s%> upon you: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Do not <S%H2490>prostitute<s%> thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, to cause her to be a <S%H2181>whore<s%>; lest the <S%H776>land<s%> fall to <S%H2181>whoredom<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2154>wickedness<s%>.
¶ Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ <S%H6437>Regard<s%> not them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, neither <S%H1245>seek<s%> after <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the hoary <S%H7872>head<s%>, and <S%H1921>honour<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the old <S%H2205>man<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ And if a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with thee in your <S%H776>land<s%>, ye shall not <S%H3238>vex<s%> him.

But the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>dwelleth<s%> with you shall be unto you as one <S%H249>born<s%> among you, and thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> him as thyself; for ye were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
¶ Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, in <S%H4060>meteyard<s%>, in <S%H4948>weight<s%>, or in <S%H4884>measure<s%>.

<S%H6664>Just<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%>, <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weights<s%>, a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah<s%>, and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1969>hin<s%>, shall ye have: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and all my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
